MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-MAR-2021 00:07.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power fault in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:59PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11PM on 26th March 2021
